co.uk.justcheckingin

Class EventsActivity.EventsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
        • co.uk.justcheckingin.EventsActivity.EventsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Enclosing class:
    EventsActivity

    public class EventsActivity.EventsAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Event>
    Defines how an Event is presented in a list row. It includes the listeners for buttons included in the row.
